bug: App asks for photos and videos permission every time it is opened
Camera app shows only black screen
notes: The Camera app launched successfully and the camera preview is visible. I did not observe any crashes, freezes, UI glitches, or a black screen. The app appears to be functioning normally.

bug: Tabs occasionally reload automatically after switching back to the app.
Share location button sometimes does not respond when tapped.
Shows No connection while opening the App
App asks for permission from settings, but tapping on Settings does not open the system settings page.
notes: After launching the Haier Wash app, a permission dialog appeared. I tapped the 'Going to Settings' button. The app did not navigate to the system settings page as expected. Instead, the dialog was dismissed, and the app's main interface loaded. The app did not crash or freeze, but it failed to perform the intended action, confirming the bug.
